eg.syntax

Class SyntaxUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.syntax.SyntaxUtils

  • public class SyntaxUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static variables and methods to search for text elements

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isWord

        public static boolean isWord(java.lang.String text,
                             int pos,
                             int length,
                             char[] nonWordStart)
        Returns if a section of text is a word. A word is initially defined such that it does not adjoin to a letter or a digit.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position where the section starts
        length - the length of the section
        nonWordStart - the array of characters that must not precede a word, in addition to letters and digits. Can be null
        Returns:
        true if a word is found

      • isWordStart

        public static boolean isWordStart(java.lang.String text,
                                  int pos,
                                  char[] nonWordStart)
        Returns if the specified position is a word start
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        nonWordStart - the array of characters that must not precede a word, in addition to letters and digits. Can be null
        Returns:
        true if word start is found

      • isWordEnd

        public static boolean isWordEnd(java.lang.String text,
                                int pos)
        Returns if the specified position is a word end
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        Returns:
        true if a word end is found

      • sectionLength

        public static int sectionLength(java.lang.String text,
                                int pos,
                                char[] endMarks,
                                char[] successors)
        Returns the length of a section that starts at the specified position and ends before one of the characters in endMarks
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        endMarks - the characters that mark the end of the section
        successors - the characters that disable endMarks if they directly follow pos
        Returns:
        the length of the section

      • sectionLength

        public static int sectionLength(java.lang.String text,
                                int pos,
                                java.lang.String[] keywords)
        Returns the length of a section that corresponds to the length of one of the strings in keywords if it is contained in the text at the specified position
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        keywords - the keywords
        Returns:
        the length of the section

      • isCharEqualTo

        public static boolean isCharEqualTo(java.lang.String text,
                                    char[] targets,
                                    int pos)
        Returns if the character at the specified position is equal to one of the characters in targets
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        targets - the target characters
        pos - the position
        Returns:
        true if equal

      • lastBlockStart

        public static int lastBlockStart(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos,
                                 java.lang.String blockStart,
                                 java.lang.String blockEnd,
                                 boolean skipQuoted,
                                 boolean quotedInLine)
        Returns the position of the last block start
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position where the search starts
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        skipQuoted - true to skip quoted blockStart and blockEnd
        quotedInLine - true to require that skipped quotations must be found inside a line; ignored if skipQuoted is false
        Returns:
        the position of the last block start. -1 if a block end is closer than a block start or if no block start is found

      • nextBlockStart

        public static int nextBlockStart(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos,
                                 java.lang.String blockStart,
                                 java.lang.String blockEnd,
                                 boolean skipQuoted,
                                 boolean quotedInLine)
        Returns the position of the next block start
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position where the search starts
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        skipQuoted - true to skip quoted blockStart and blockEnd
        quotedInLine - true to require that skipped quotations must be found inside a line; ignored if skipQuoted is false
        Returns:
        the position of the next block start. -1 if a block end is closer than a block start or if no block start is found

      • nextBlockEnd

        public static int nextBlockEnd(java.lang.String text,
                               int pos,
                               java.lang.String blockStart,
                               java.lang.String blockEnd,
                               boolean skipQuoted,
                               boolean quotedInLine)
        Returns the position of the next block end
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position where the search starts
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        skipQuoted - true to skip quoted blockStart and blockEnd
        quotedInLine - true to require that skipped quotations must be found inside a line; ignored if skipQuoted is false
        Returns:
        the position of the next block end. -1 if a block start is closer than a block end or if no block end is found

      • nextUnquoted

        public static int nextUnquoted(java.lang.String text,
                               java.lang.String toSearch,
                               int pos)
        Returns the position of the next toSearch that is not quoted
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        toSearch - the string that is searched
        pos - the position where the search starts
        Returns:
        the position of toSearch, -1 if not found

      • nextUnquotedInLine

        public static int nextUnquotedInLine(java.lang.String text,
                                     java.lang.String toSearch,
                                     int pos)
        Returns the position of the next toSearch that is not quoted in which a quotation must be found inside a line
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        toSearch - the string that is searched
        pos - the position where the search starts
        Returns:
        the position of toSearch, -1 if not found

      • firstQuoteMark

        public static int firstQuoteMark(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos)
        Returns the position of the first quote mark (single or double) in the text before pos
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position before which a quote mark is searched
        Returns:
        the position of the quote mark; -1 if no quote mark is found before pos

      • lastQuoteMark

        public static int lastQuoteMark(java.lang.String text,
                                int pos)
        Returns the position of the last quote mark (single or double) behind pos
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position behind which a quote mark is searched
        Returns:
        the position; -1 if no quote mark is found behind pos

        Returns:

        public static int lastNonEscaped(java.lang.String text,
                                 char toSearch,
                                 int pos)
        Returns the last position of toSearch that is not preceded by a backslash that is itself not preceded by a backslash.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        toSearch - the char that is searched
        pos - the position where the search starts
        Returns:
        the position; -1 if not found

        Parameters:

      • nextNonSpace

        public static int nextNonSpace(java.lang.String text,
                               int pos)
        Returns the position of the next space character
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position where the search starts
        Returns:
        the position of the next space or the text length if none is found
